segments.text: It's a beautiful day , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you now the temperature today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How nice . I hope the weather will stay like this for the whole week . I'm going on the canoe trip this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a good plan . The TV weather forecast says the hurricane is coming this weekend , and the temperature will also drop to 66 degrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a nuisance ! Every time I plan to go canoeing or camping , a storm comes along . The sky gets dark , the wind starts to howl and the temperature drops.Well , I'd better stay home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never make any definite weekend plan until Friday morning . Then after listening to the weather temperature , I make my plans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's smart . I'm going to start doing the same thing .
segments.speaker: S1
